modName: CHSBHC v3 - ADM     Eilhart s Dress
summary:
My conversions of Nimezis\' really pretty dress  :}

CHSBHC v3   -  ADM
descriptionHtml:
My conversions of Nimezis\' really pretty dress  :}
*** [u]ADM TBBP is up[/u]  :) ***


[center][b]Tell me please if I messed up anything  :([/center][/b]

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img834/1296/banner2new.png[/IMG]

CHSBv3 - ADM conversions of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36738/]Eilhart\'s Dress[/url]

Black Retexture by Novgoroth.

Reb-Black retexture by Aipex8.


************************************************************
Help needed please.  I need  mesh weighting aficionados for dresses, skirts, stockings.
A PM would be nice.  Thanks.
************************************************************



[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/9498/misc2.png[/IMG]

Endorse the original, not me.  Self contained, both body types and bounces.  

[b]Naming convention is as follows :[/b]

- The first [u]LETTER[/u] is the color, except RB (red-black)
- If the second [u]LETTER[/u] is D, this means deluxe (clothing has the plates, collar, amulet)
- if there is a [u]LETTER[/u]  n, this is the non-glossy versions (everything else is glossy).

- \"Ball Dress\" is the dress with [u]only[/u] the collar
- \"Dress\" does not have the plates, collar, amulet
- Anything with a D has the plates, collar, amulet (as the original intended)

\"help Eilhart 0\"  craftable, upgradable (may take up lots of space in the cloth section of forge, sorry).

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/5503/issues2.png[/IMG]

1- The bounce and motions are a little odd. SORRY.  :(
2- craftable and upgradable (may take up lots of space in the cloth section of forge, sorry).
3- no legs, because why add more clipping?  :)
4- Dress splits at legs because I erased the weights to add body bounce  :(  This I am most sorry for.

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img841/61/endbanner2.png[/IMG]
author: Nimezis  Novgoroth  Aipex8
